title: Brutal Lyon 25 Stair, Destroyer of Action Sport Dreams
content:
I love Australian pro skater Ricky Glaserâ€™s narration of all the videos he could find of people attempting to jump a famous set of 25 stairs in Lyon. Aaron â€œJawsâ€ Homoki (no relation), was the first to do it despite injuring himself on the stairs previously. At 6:15 the scooter carnage starts, â€œLike is he alive after that?â€ We can also appreciate Glaserâ€™s criticism of the camera work at about 9:50. This is truly a masterpiece.

By the way, you may have heard of Ricky Glaser, as he is the world record holder for most kick flips in a minute, 36, which is just about 3 per second if my math is right.
